description: A humorous look at dermatologists' quick decision-making.
title: Rash Decisions
n_1: Dr. Skin rushes through appointments, diagnosing with speed.
n_2: Nurse Patch notes Dr. Skin's efficiency, albeit with a raised brow.
c2_2: Sure, but don't you ever pause?
c1_3: No time for that, we've got skin in the game!
c2_3: And lots of rash decisions, I see.
n_4: They both share a laugh over the pun.
c2_4: Just be sure they're not all itchy triggers!
